nodes.text: Yolten was a Human male officer of the Galactic Republic's military who served aboard the space station Carrick Station. He worked as a flagship commissioner during the Cold War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Yolten first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Strongholds, an expansion for Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2014, as a flagship commissioner.
